title.rendered: Barbados vs Guyana, Caribbean T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Pitch Report

1st innings average score: 117

2nd innings average score: 124

Type: Sluggish wicket. Rewards patient batters.

Teams

Probable XI for Barbados: Rahkeem Cornwall, Kyle Mayers, Corbin Bosch, Quinton de Kock, David Miller (c), Azam Khan (wk), Jason Holder, Obed McCoy, Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Joshua Bishop, Ramon Simmonds

Probable XI for Guyana: Paul Stirling/Shai Hope, Chandrapaul Hemraj, Colin Ingram, Heinrich Klaasen (wk), Shimron Hetmyer (c), Keemo Paul, Romario Shepherd, Odean Smith, Junior Sinclair, Imran Tahir, Tabraiz Shamsi

Also Read:

India vs Australia 1st T20I: Fantasy Picks

Pakistan vs England 1st T20I: Fantasy Tips

Game Changers

Quinton de Kock’s form has timely peaked. In his last five games, he has smashed 197 runs at an average of 66 and pouched four catches.

Not only has Corbin Bosch been consistent with the but also has been effective in the field. Besides his 184 runs at 37, he has pocketed seven catches – the most for Barbados.

Smart Picks

David Miller has been so incredible this season that his lowest score reads an unbeaten 17. He has taken up the responsibility to finish the game, overall accumulating 166 runs at a strike rate of 155.

In his last 10 professional T20s, Heinrich Klaasen has scored 233 runs at an average of 39. In this edition, along with his consistent run-making, he has taken three catches and inflicted four stumpings.

Tabraiz Shamsi has taken the bulk of the wickets for Guyana. His eight wickets have come at an excellent average of 11.

Romario Shepherd has the highest score of 36 and the best figures of 3 for 22, keeping fantasy players interested with his dual skills.

Power Players

Kyle Mayers, the highest run-scorer of the season, has been a part of the Ultimate Team in six of seven games this season. He has scored 286 runs, scalped five wickets, and pouched four catches.          

For Guyana, Shimron Hetmyer has collected the most runs. He has provided 30-run bonus fantasy points in four of the last five matches.

With 11 wickets in seven games, Jason Holder and Obed McCoy are the second joint-highest wicket-takers of the edition. In addition to his wicket-taking heroics, Holder has grabbed as many as six catches.

Fantasy Tip of The Day

The slow wickets in the Caribbean have made life difficult for the batters. It is thus safe, in fantasy leagues, to go for all-rounders. That way, you will get crucial points one way or the other and stay on course.
